HEADLINE: In continuation of our letters dated October 17, 2022 and October 21, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30(6) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Transcript of the Investor call made on October 21, 2022, on Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2022, is available on the Company's website at www.metrobrands.com.

In continuation of our letters dated July 27, 2022 and August 1, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30(6) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Transcript of the Investor call made on August 1, 2022, on Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2022, is available on the Company's website at www.metrobrands.com

In continuation of our letters dated May 17, 2022 and May 23, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30(6) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Transcript of the Investor call made on May 23, 2022, on Audited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2022, is available on the Company's website at www.metrobrands.com.
